Container.Name: PatreonCredits
Container.Overview: Generate professional scrolling end-credits videos (MP4) for YouTube content creators, featuring Patreon supporters. Fetch patrons from the Patreon API or paste custom names. Supports 35 bundled fonts, CJK characters, 1-5 column layouts, 720p/1080p/4K, and customizable colors and styling.

Config.Name: Output Directory
Config.Description: Directory where generated videos are saved

Config.Name: Patreon Token
Config.Description: Your Patreon Creator Access Token (leave empty to configure in the web UI or use dummy data)

Config.Name: Campaign ID
Config.Description: Your Patreon Campaign ID (leave empty to configure in the web UI)

Config.Name: Use Dummy Data
Config.Description: Use dummy patron names for testing (no Patreon credentials needed)

Config.Name: Port
Config.Description: Internal server port (should match Web UI Port)
